dji.sdk.api.GroundStation

Class DJIGroundStationWayPointAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.GroundStation.DJIGroundStationWayPointAction

  • public class DJIGroundStationWayPointAction
extends java.lang.Object

    DJI Ground Station Waypoint Action Class

    The Waypoint Action class is used to contain all of the actions for a single waypoint, the associated parameters for these actions, and information about these actions.
    As only the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series have the ability to perform actions at waypoints, this entire class is only to be used with those drones.
    Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
    Version:
    V2.4.0
    Author:
    DJI Software
    See Also:
    DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction

    • Field Detail

      • actionList

        public java.util.ArrayList<DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction> actionList
        Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
        An ArrayList of all the actions in the waypoint. Actions are commands for the aircraft to carry out at a waypoint. Adding multiple actions to a waypoint gives the aircraft a series of commands to execute at that waypoint.
        Each waypoint can have a maximum of 16 actions. There are 6 possible actions to choose from:
        Way_Point_Action_Stay - Stay at the waypoint and take no action.
        Way_Point_Action_Simple_Shot - Take a photo.
        Way_Point_Action_Video_Start - Take a video.
        Way_Point_Action_Video_Stop - Stop taking video.
        Way_Point_Action_Craft_Yaw - adjust the aircraft's heading.
        Way_Point_Action_Gimbal_Pitch - adjust the gimbal's pitch.
        See Also:
        DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction

      • paramList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> paramList
        Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
        Each waypoint action requires a parameter in order for the aircraft to execute it. For example, the action Way_Point_Action_Craft_Yaw requires the heading to point the aircraft towards, in degrees, as a parameter. The parameters for the waypoint's actions are stored here, in the ArrayList paramList.
        Just as there can only be a maximum of 16 actions in a waypoint, paramList should only contain at most 16 parameters at any one time.
        See Also:
        DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction

      • actionNum

        public int actionNum
        Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
        The number of actions in the waypoint. In other words, the current size of the ArrayList actionList. Should never be larger than 16.
        See Also:
        DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction

      • actionRepeat

        public int actionRepeat
        Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
        Number of times the aircraft will repeatedly execute the actions at the waypoint.
        Note that this is the number of times the actions are repeated, meaning that if actionRepeat is 1, the aircraft will carry out the actions twice.
        Range is [0, 15]. Default is 0.
        See Also:
        DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction

    • Constructor Detail

      • DJIGroundStationWayPointAction

        public DJIGroundStationWayPointAction(int actionNum,
                                      int actionRepeat)
        Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
        DJIGroundStationWayPointAction constructor function. Takes in actionNum and actionRepeat as parameters.
        Parameters:
        actionNum - Value to set actionNum as, the number of actions in the waypoint
        actionRepeat - Value to set actionRepeat as, the number of times to repeat the execution of the waypoint actions
        See Also:
        DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction

      • DJIGroundStationWayPointAction

        public DJIGroundStationWayPointAction()
        Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
        DJIGroundStationWayPointAction constructor function. Sets actionNum = 0 and actionRepeat = 1.
        See Also:
        DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction

      • DJIGroundStationWayPointAction

        public DJIGroundStationWayPointAction(int actionRepeatNum)
        Supported only by the Inspire 1 and Phantom 3 Series
        DJIGroundStationWayPointAction constructor function. Takes in actionRepeatNum as a parameter. Sets actionNum = 0.
        Parameters:
        actionRepeatNum - Value to set actionRepeat as, the number of times to repeat the execution of the waypoint actions
        See Also:
        DJIGroundStationWaypoint, DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction
